item.title: pubsub
item.description:
Usage

Options

Description

A repository may be able to store a publish/subscribe specification to propagate the creation or update of component versions. If such an implementation is available this command can be used to set the pub/sub specification for a repository. If no specification is given an existing specification will be removed for the given repository. The specification can be queried with the ocm get pubsub. Types and specification formats are shown for the topic ocm ocm-pubsub.
